subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a rainy night when the game started 1 hour and 20 minutes late because of poor field conditions, Mets Manager Terry Collins summed up the night: “Uncomfortable from start to finish, no doubt.”
snippet: On a rainy night when the game started 1 hour and 20 minutes late because of poor field conditions, Mets Manager Terry Collins summed up the night: “Uncomfortable from start to finish, no doubt.”
